snippet: Customs officials announced on Friday their third large seizure of smuggled ivory in less than three months, saying they had intercepted 779 elephant tusks valued at around $1.4 million.
abstract: Customs officials in Hong Kong announce their third large seizure of smuggled ivory in less than three months, saying they had intercepted 779 elephant tusks weighing 2,900 pounds in a container originating from Kenya.
lead_paragraph: Customs officials announced on Friday their third large seizure of smuggled ivory in less than three months, saying they had intercepted 779 elephant tusks valued at around $1.4 million.

headline.seo: Seizures of Illegal Ivory Are Rising in Hong Kong
headline.main: Seizures of Illegal Ivory Are Rising in Hong Kong
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong: Seizures of Ivory Increase
